Package StyleSheets.BaseComponents

Class StyleSheet.Builder

java.lang.Object
StyleSheets.BaseComponents.StyleSheet.Builder
Enclosing class:
StyleSheet
public static class StyleSheet.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
The builder class for the stylesheet. It is an inner static class used to build an immutable instance of a StyleSheet object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Builder​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Constructor for stylesheet builder.

    StyleSheet build()
    Builds the stylesheet and returns it.
    StyleSheet.Builder normalize()
    Normalizes the stylesheet using normalize.css v8.0.1 provided by Necolas.
